channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Skills Rot At Machine Speed? AI Is Changing How Developers Learn And Think
item.description: Long-term, widespread AI coding might hamper learning, problem-solving and—eventually—the ability to maintain software systems.

item.title: What To Know About AI, Cybersecurity And Compliance Frameworks
item.description: Staying ahead of the changes is vital to avoid penalties, protect data and maintain trust.

item.title: Backdoors Installed, Passwords Stolen — Who Is The ToyMaker?
item.description: This ToyMaker isn’t to be played with; your accounts and data are at risk.
